name: grilled cheese factory
description:
a 2d platformer where you venture through a grilled cheese factory to find the missing grilled cheeses. bounce on burgers, dodge nachos, and jump on baguettes to get to the end.

CONTROLS:

a and d to move left and right, space to jump

controller support included!

~10-15 minute playtime

made in the span of a week

sfx by leshy sfx maker

music by me
